03_load_datasets module

Dataset Loading Module for Cybersecurity RAG System.

Simple utility to load previously downloaded datasets into memory for processing. This module provides a unified interface to access all cybersecurity datasets and prepare them for RAG pipeline ingestion.

Author: DSR Portfolio Project Team

03_load_datasets.load_dataset(dataset_name: str) → DataFrame | None[source]

Load a single dataset from the raw data directory.

Return type:

Optional[DataFrame]

Args:

dataset_name: Name of the dataset folder (heimdall, ttp_mapping, etc.)

Returns:

DataFrame containing the dataset or None if not found

03_load_datasets.load_all_datasets() → Dict[str, DataFrame][source]

Load all available cybersecurity datasets.

Return type:

Dict[str, DataFrame]

Returns:

Dictionary mapping dataset names to DataFrames

03_load_datasets.get_dataset_summary(datasets: Dict[str, DataFrame]) → None[source]

Log summary information for all loaded datasets.

Return type:

None

Args:

datasets: Dictionary of dataset name to DataFrame mappings
